ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: they are found on the warden in the prison in upper guk.  the warden spawns in a particular spot every 3 or 4 kills i think, and he rarely has the belt, which
ygData.messageBody:
they are found on the warden in the prison in upper guk. the warden spawns
in a particular spot every 3 or 4 kills i think, and he rarely has the belt,
which is a very nice piece of equipment indeed. i was thinking of camping
him but it is a long tough camp.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Carole Roth [mailto:galaxy4@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 30, 1999 6:41 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] I heard about some equipment...


From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>

A friend told me about some pieces of armor that can only be worn by
rogues or bards. I believe they were called elf-hide gloves and
troll-hide belt. They each raised 2 different stats 5 points each. These
2 pieces of armor sound like a must have but I have no idea where to
find them. Anyone know?
BTW: I prefer to use fast light weapons over minos...Once we get
dual weild it will save lots of stamina using the light weapons also
(combine scimitar and combine longsword is what I have my heart set on).


-Flatliner (lvl 9 bard on tunare)
